name: notebook_tabs
description: Paper-like cards with colorful section tabs. Editorial feel.
signature_elements: Colored section tabs on the side
extra_css: .paper-card { background: var(--bg-card); border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); padding: clamp(1.5rem, 3vw, 3rem); position: relative; } .section-tab { position: absolute; left: -4px; top: 20%; width: 4px; height: 40px; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0; } .tab-red { background: #e74c3c; } .tab-blue { background: #3498db; } .tab-green { background: #27ae60; }
